00023 #ifndef THREAD_HPP
00024 #define THREAD_HPP
00025 
00026 #include "semaphore.hpp"
00027 #include "databuf.hpp"
00028 
00029 namespace uStreamLib {
00030         /*
00031          * Forward declaration for implementation.
00032          */
00033         class Impl_Thread;
00034 
00038         class US_API_EXPORT Thread : public Object {
00039         public:
00043                 Thread(void);
00044 
00048                 virtual ~Thread(void);
00049 
00054                 int32 init(char* name);
00055 
00060                 static void sleep(int32 ms);
00061 
00065                 char* getName(void)
00066                 {
00067                         return _dbName.toString();
00068                 }
00069 
00073                 void setName(char* name)
00074                 {
00075                         _dbName.copy(name);
00076                 }
00077 
00081                 void start(void)
00082                 {
00083                         _semStart.post();
00084                 }
00085 
00089                 void doTerminate(void)
00090                 {
00091                         _semTerminate.post();
00092                 }
00093 
00097                 void bypassRun(void)
00098                 {
00099                         _bBypassRun = true;
00100                 }
00101 
00105                 bool getBypassRun(void)
00106                 {
00107                         return _bBypassRun;
00108                 }
00109 
00113                 void detach(void);
00114 
00118                 void join(void** ret_data);
00119 
00123                 void cancel(void);
00124 
00129                 virtual void run(void);
00130 
00134                 void waitForStart(void)
00135                 {
00136                         _semStart.wait();
00137                 }
00138 
00142                 void threadProc(void);
00143                 
00144         private:
00145                 /* copy constructor not available */
00146                 Thread(Thread&)
00147                         : Object(UOSUTIL_RTTI_THREAD)
00148                 {
00149                 }
00150 
00151                 /* specific implementation */
00152                 Impl_Thread* _impl;
00153 
00154                 // thread name
00155                 DataBuf _dbName;
00156 
00157                 // start semaphore
00158                 Semaphore _semStart;
00159 
00160                 // termination semaphore
00161                 Semaphore _semTerminate;
00162 
00163                 // flag: bypass run method
00164                 bool _bBypassRun; 
00165 
00166                 // flag: this thread is a dummy SELF thread
00167                 bool _bIsSelf;
00168 
00169                 // current thread used by getCurrent()
00170                 static Thread* _current;
00171         };
00172 }
